document_data.mainbody:
Hedge wanderer armor was a unique enchanted armor made of cured goat hide, created sometime before the late 15 century DR.
This hide armor possessed a simple +1 enchantment and slightly boosted the wearers dexterity and reaction. Additionally, the wearer received a minor improvement in their knowledge of nature.
Some years before the , a simple goat herder aided a druid in investigating a strange hedge maze. Thankful for the help, she used her nature magic to bless all of the shepherds goats and placed a protective enchantment on his simple goat-hide garb. By the late 15 century DR, hedge wanderer armor was owned by Arron, a hin druid trader from the Emerald Grove in the Western Heartlands.
